name: TORQ Asset Pack
description:
Thanks for checking out the TORQ asset pack! In here, we'll talk about setting up files, suggested fonts to use, how to use the master pages, design inspiration, a collection of shapes, and stat templates to use.

Is there something you'd like from this asset pack that it currently doesn't have? Shoot me a DM @will_jobst on Twitter and I'll try and make it happen.

This contains a PDF and an affinity template.
